characters.name: Dracula
characters.desc: Your ball has been bit! Any upgraded pegs hit by your ball will lose their upgrades at the end of the round.

characters.name: Frankenstein
characters.desc: You are being zapped by Frankenstein! You will lose money every 5 seconds your ball is in play.

characters.name: Werewolf
characters.desc: Its gonna be a full moon tonight! If you don't have a silver bullet by the end of the round, you will be eaten!

characters.name: Ghost
characters.desc: The lights are out and your ball is haunted! Your ball will emit a spectral light once it is dropped.
